name: In Your Hands (genievil)
description:
In Your Hands is a platformer and puzzle game with 5 levels in total, each one becoming progressively more difficult. The game features a small demon ghost making its way through obstacles in order to reach each end goal. The obstacles involve correctly timing jumps to each new platform, or exploring the map to find objects which will help the player to advance to the next area. The goal of the player is to successfully make it to each exit portal, where your character will reunite with the higher demon it belongs to.

CREDITS

Background Trees : https://szadiart.itch.io/pixel-dark-forest

Exit Portal: PNGGuru.com

Code: Michael Baker
